name: Limeade Tycoon
description:
Ever wanted to see Lemonade Tycoon revitalized with modern technologies? Then Limeade Tycoon is here to do just that, we plan on providing a similar experience that it brought to use back in the early 2000's. 

We have been working on this game for not too long, I am excited to keep pumping out features and develop an interesting story and progression.

We are just a team of 2 developers so we will do what we can.

Thus far this is the alpha version of the game with the ability to play the game with more updates to come frequently. 

Would love to get feedback on features so far and ideas for future features as well!
